mapper.update: UPDATE ticket SET ticket_email=#{email}, ticket_reg='Y', last_updated_date= NOW() WHERE ticket_id=#{ticketId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.event_name, e.ticket_id FROM event d RIGHT OUTER JOIN ticket e ON d.event_id = e.ticket_event_id WHERE e.ticket_email=#{email} AND e.ticket_reg='Y' AND e.ticket_status='Y' ORDER BY d.start_date desc;
SELECT d.event_name, d.event_type, d.start_date, d.end_date, d.place, d.event_desc, e.serial_num FROM event d RIGHT OUTER JOIN ticket e ON d.event_id = e.ticket_event_id WHERE ticket_id=#{ticketId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket SET ticket_status='N', last_updated_date= NOW() WHERE ticket_id=#{ticketId}
